module.name: avm-res-network-dnszone
module.description: AVM Terraform Module for DNS Zone

inputs.name: cname_records
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                = string
    resource_group_name = string
    zone_name           = string
    ttl                 = number
    record              = string
    tags                = optional(map(string), null)
    target_resource_id  = optional(string)
  }))

inputs.name: srv_records
a_records
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                = string
    resource_group_name = string
    zone_name           = string
    ttl                 = number
    records             = optional(list(string))
    target_resource_id  = optional(string)
    tags                = optional(map(string), null)
  }))

inputs.name: aaaa_records
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                = string
    resource_group_name = string
    zone_name           = string
    ttl                 = number
    records             = optional(list(string))
    target_resource_id  = optional(string)
    tags                = optional(map(string), null)
  }))

inputs.name: caa_records
mx_records
ns_records
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                = string
    resource_group_name = string
    zone_name           = string
    ttl                 = number
    records             = list(string)
    tags                = optional(map(string), null)
  }))

inputs.name: ptr_records
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                = string
    resource_group_name = string
    zone_name           = string
    ttl                 = number
    records             = list(string)
    tags                = optional(map(string), null)
  }))

inputs.name: txt_records

outputs.name: max_number_of_record_sets
outputs.description: Maximum number of Records in Zone output

outputs.name: number_of_record_sets
outputs.description: Number of records in DNS Zone

outputs.name: name_servers
outputs.description: List of values that make up NS Record for Zone
